sentences.sContent: Two women in widow's black touch his arm sociably as he passes the street corner where they sit singing folk songs to each other.
sentences.sContent_eng: Two women in widow's black touch his arm sociably as he passes the street corner where they sit singing folk songs to each other.
sentences.sCn: 两个身着素黑衣服的女人坐在街角互相唱着民谣，当他从身边走过时她们和蔼地轻拍他的手臂。

synos.tran: 和蔼可亲地；善于应酬地

words.tran: 社交的；好交际的；友善的
善于交际；社交性；好交际
